---
description: Show help information for claude-code-scheduler
argument-hint: command
---

Display help information for claude-code-scheduler CLI commands.

## Usage

```bash
# Show general help
claude-code-scheduler --help

# Show command-specific help
claude-code-scheduler COMMAND --help

# Show version
claude-code-scheduler --version
```

## Arguments

- `COMMAND` (optional): Specific command to get help for
- `--help` / `-h`: Show help information
- `--version` / `-v`: Show version information

## Examples

```bash
# General help
claude-code-scheduler --help

# Command help
claude-code-scheduler search --help

# Version information
claude-code-scheduler --version
```

## Output

Displays usage information, available commands, and options.
